name: MADHUR PRAYAS
briefDescription: Madhur Prayas is an Indian National NGO working for prevention & care of Obesity & Diabetes, providing technical & marketing support to Stevia farmers and helping the nation in keeping the environment clean.Our Mission•To educate people all across the section of the society about the cause and consequences of Obesity and its management. •To spread awareness about the cause and consequences of Diabetes and work towards its prevention & care.•To spread awareness about the benefits of Stevia and its usages in daily life.•To provide technical & marketing support to farmers for growing Stevia on large scale.•To work for the clean environment by providing assistance to individuals and organizations working in the field of waste mgnt.
